products.name: Fig Bar Blueberry
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Bars, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits
products.labels: No gluten, Organic, Vegetarian, Kosher, Vegan, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with real blueberries and wholesome ingredients","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce waste","Non-GMO verified, ensuring no genetically modified organisms","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives for better quality"]

products.name: Cholula Hot Sauce (Original) imp
products.facts: ["Cholula Hot Sauce is made from a blend of piquin and arbol peppers, known for their rich flavor and moderate heat.","The sauce contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a natural taste and quality.","Cholula is produced in Mexico, supporting local agriculture and sustainable farming practices.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental responsibility."]

products.name: JIF Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["JIF Creamy Peanut Butter is made with roasted peanuts, sugar, hydrogenated vegetable oils, and salt.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal practices.","JIF prioritizes high-quality peanuts sourced from U.S. farms, ensuring consistency and taste.","The product contains no artificial preservatives, providing a more natural peanut butter option."]

products.name: Steel Cut Irish Oatmeal
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals,Flakes,Cereal flakes,Rolled flakes,Rolled oats
products.facts: ["Steel cut oats are made from whole oat groats that are chopped into pieces, preserving their nutritional value.","The production of steel cut oats typically has a lower carbon footprint compared to processed oat products due to minimal processing.","Steel cut oats are a good source of fiber, protein, and essential nutrients, contributing to a balanced diet.","They are often packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability."]

products.name: Corn Muffin Mix
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Biscuits and cakes,Cakes,Cooking helpers,Dessert mixes,Pastry helpers,Baking Mixes,Cake mixes,Muffins mix
products.facts: ["Made primarily from cornmeal, flour, and sugar.","Often contains no artificial preservatives or flavors.","Many brands source non-GMO corn for their mixes.","Typically packaged in recyclable materials to reduce ecological impact."]

products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Special breads, Bagel breads, Plastics
products.facts: ["500ml containers are often made from recyclable materials such as PET plastic or glass.","Using 500ml containers can help reduce single-use plastic waste when reused or recycled properly.","500ml is a convenient size for portion control, promoting better consumption habits.","High-quality 500ml bottles are designed to be BPA-free, ensuring safety for food and beverage storage."]

products.name: 2% Milk
products.facts: ["2% milk contains 2% milk fat, making it a lower-fat option compared to whole milk.","The production of 2% milk typically requires about 1.5 gallons of water per gallon of milk produced.","2% milk is often fortified with vitamin D to enhance its nutritional value.","The packaging of 2% milk is usually recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact."]

products.name: Coca-Cola
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Sodas, Colas, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["The bottle is made from 100% recycled PET plastic.","Coca-Cola aims to use 50% recycled content in its PET plastic bottles by 2030.","The company has committed to reducing its carbon footprint and aims to be carbon neutral by 2040.","Coca-Cola conducts regular quality tests to ensure that its products meet safety and quality standards."]

products.name: Healthy Grains Granola Oats & Honey With Toasted Coconut
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Mueslis
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats for a nutritious breakfast option.","Contains natural honey as a sweetener, reducing the need for refined sugars.","Toasted coconut adds flavor while providing healthy fats and fiber.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Power Protein Cakes
products.categories: Cooking helpers, Dessert mixes, Pancake mixes, Pancake
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality protein sources to support muscle recovery and growth.","Contains no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring a more natural product.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Gluten-free options available, catering to various dietary needs."]

products.name: Power cakes flapjack & waffle mix buttermilk
products.ingredients_text: 100% whole grain wheat flour, 100% whole grain oat flour, 100% whole grain oat flour, protein blend (wheat protein isolate, whey protein concentrate), non-fat sweet cream buttermilk powder, brown sugar, baking powder (mono-calcium phosphate, sodium bicarbonate), sea salt.
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality buttermilk for rich flavor.","Contains whole grain oats for added nutrition and fiber.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","No artificial preservatives or flavors, ensuring a natural product."]
